attributes.action: Save the English pub by allowing smoking to resume.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Whilst city and town center pubs can manage without smokers, rural and estate pubs have lost so many customers many now face closure.
There was a belief that non smokers would take the place of smokers, this did not happen, and if these pubs shut it means fewer pubs with more customers, and this will lead to more trouble such as fights, murders or assults.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
